column4: cvd: ive got 2x 9800GT's in this box, i cant even install the proper nvidia drivers following every guide i could find with 8.10
instangir: i had an xorg file ... just once i had installed the nvidia drivers i lost my xterm totally so i rolled back to 8.04 and its working fine with sli and all
ya i have had alot of issues with xorg's configless stuff with nvidia proprietary
but i did get it setup eventually
